Package com.sl.algorithms.core.interfaces.select

Selection Algorithm

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MedianFinder<T extends java.lang.Comparable>

    Given an array A = A[1,...,n] and an index kMax (1 ≤ kMax ≤ n), find the kth smallest element of A.

    Reference 1
    Reference 2
    QuickSelect<T extends java.lang.Comparable>
    Find kth largest/smallest element in an unsorted array, in Linear time as average-case.
